mapper.insert: insert into users ( user_name, user_password, user_email, user_profile_image_url, user_register_date ) values ( #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, '', now() )
mapper.update: update users set USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}, USER_NAME = #{userName} WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.delete: delete from users where WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
